column1: Wishing everyone a healthy and #HappyThanksgiving!

For those who gave up sharing in major milestones this year – from graduations and weddings to birthdays and anniversaries – please know these sacrifices were meaningful to all of your fellow Americans and your selflessness is what I am most grateful for this #Thanksgiving.
We know this year has had no shortage of difficulties. There will be pain felt at dinner tables across the country today especially where a loved one a job or a small business has been lost.
With the nation at its nadir President Lincoln had the wisdom to declare the fourth Thursday of every November as a date for us to reflect on our blessings despite society’s current challenges.
